1-1.event: LeBron drops 38 points on New Year's Day to beat the Bobcats. Starts the year with a bang.

1-2.event: LeBron posts a triple-double and reminds everyone he's still the best player on the planet.

1-3.event: LeBron probably had avocado toast for breakfast. Revolutionary.

1-4.event: LeBron scores 30+ for the 1000th time in his career. Just casual GOAT things.

1-5.event: LeBron tweets something cryptic. NBA Twitter loses its mind for 48 hours.

1-6.event: LeBron watches Bronny's game and scouts better than half the league's GMs.

1-7.event: LeBron posts 'Taco Tuesday' content. The internet breaks.

1-8.event: LeBron records his 65th career triple-double, passing Larry Bird.

1-9.event: LeBron drops 36-8-7 against the Clippers in a battle of titans.

1-10.event: LeBron sips wine before the game. Opponents already defeated mentally.

1-11.event: LeBron posts another efficient 25+ point game because that's just Tuesday for him.

1-12.event: LeBron wears a pair of shoes worth more than your car to the arena.

1-13.event: LeBron reads a book on the plane. Somehow this makes ESPN headlines.

1-14.event: LeBron scores 20+ points in his 800th consecutive game. Consistency is his middle name.

1-15.event: LeBron posts a workout video at 5am. You're still asleep.

1-16.event: LeBron wins Eastern Conference Player of the Month for the 18th time.

1-17.event: LeBron goes to Savannah's Instagram and drops a fire emoji. Couple goals.

1-18.event: LeBron drops 32-10-7 because a normal statline is too boring.

1-19.event: LeBron breaks another record that people said was unbreakable.

1-20.event: LeBron sits courtside at a Lakers game. Wait, he IS a Laker. Mind blown.

1-21.event: LeBron becomes the 3rd youngest to 24,000 points. Jordan who?

1-22.event: LeBron eulogizes Kobe at Staples Center. Not a dry eye in the building.

1-23.event: LeBron ties Michael Jordan with his 866th consecutive game with 10+ points.

1-24.event: LeBron wears a Kobe jersey to warmups. Mamba Forever.

1-25.event: LeBron passes MJ for 4th all-time in scoring. Casually, in Philly.

1-26.event: LeBron hosts a watch party for the Super Bowl. His snack game is undefeated.

1-27.event: LeBron posts his 49th career triple-double. Just another day at the office.

1-28.event: LeBron complains about a call. He was right. Refs in shambles.

1-29.event: LeBron plays with Bronny on Instagram Live. Father-son bonding goals.

1-30.event: LeBron drops 33-10-6 and reminds everyone he's on another level.

1-31.event: LeBron posts 'Just a kid from Akron' on Instagram. We cry.

2-1.event: LeBron scores 42 points in a win. February starts with a bang.

2-2.event: LeBron makes his 13th straight All-Star team. Clock is automatic.

2-3.event: LeBron practices his signature chalk toss. Still perfect after 20 years.

2-4.event: LeBron posts a 30-point triple-double because regular 30-point games are too easy.

2-5.event: LeBron dunks on someone half his age. Father Time is terrified.

2-6.event: LeBron changes his Twitter profile pic. Millions adjust accordingly.

2-7.event: LeBron breaks the all-time scoring record. GOAT status: CONFIRMED.

2-8.event: LeBron scores 23 points in 23 minutes. Numerology is undefeated.

2-9.event: LeBron adjusts his headband. ESPN does a 30-minute segment on it.

2-10.event: LeBron gets his 7th triple-double of the season before All-Star break.

2-11.event: LeBron scores 32 points on his way to a historic win streak with Miami.

2-12.event: LeBron posts a photo with a book. Suddenly everyone's reading.

2-13.event: LeBron sends Savannah flowers. The bar for husbands has been raised.

2-14.event: LeBron drops 42-5-6 on Valentine's Day. His only love is winning.

2-15.event: LeBron makes his 16th All-Star team. Still snubbed in 2008.

2-16.event: LeBron sits out. His team loses by 40. Point proven.

2-17.event: LeBron Team LeBron defeats Team Stephen in the All-Star Game.

2-18.event: LeBron wins his first All-Star Game MVP. The first of many.

2-19.event: LeBron posts workout content. Gym rats everywhere feel inadequate.

2-20.event: LeBron records his 50th career triple-double. Half a hundred.

2-21.event: LeBron wears a Thom Browne suit that costs more than college tuition.

2-22.event: LeBron drops 30-10-7 in his sleep. Well, almost.

2-23.event: LeBron pays tribute to Kobe on 2/23. Not a dry eye anywhere.

2-24.event: Kobe's jersey retirement day. LeBron honors the Mamba.

2-25.event: LeBron passes 28,000 career points. Still counting.

2-26.event: LeBron activates playoff mode. League on notice.

2-27.event: LeBron scores 27-13-6. Those are video game numbers.

2-28.event: LeBron ends February with another 30+ point game. Routine.

2-29.event: Leap Day LeBron hits different. Scores 30+ because it's a special occasion.

3-1.event: LeBron wins Eastern Conference Player of the Month. Again.

3-2.event: LeBron arrives at Staples in a custom Rolls Royce. Kings move different.

3-3.event: LeBron records back-to-back triple-doubles because one isn't enough.

3-4.event: LeBron posts a picture with a glass of wine. Classy as always.

3-5.event: LeBron reaches 28,000 career points. The journey continues.

3-6.event: LeBron drops 37-8-7 in Madison Square Garden. Broadway Bron.

3-7.event: LeBron tweets 'Live.Laugh.Love' after a win. Meme accounts rejoice.

3-8.event: LeBron scores 46 points against the Pacers. March Madness starts early.

3-9.event: LeBron wears shorts in 40-degree weather. Built different.

3-10.event: LeBron passes 26,000 career points. The climb never stops.

3-11.event: LeBron eats a pregame banana. Everyone analyzes his nutrition.

3-12.event: LeBron notches his 40th career triple-double. Casual excellence.

3-13.event: LeBron leads Lakers to another W before the COVID shutdown.

3-14.event: Pi Day. LeBron scores 31.4 points. Math is undefeated.

3-15.event: Ides of March. LeBron betrays the Celtics with 36 points.

3-16.event: LeBron watches March Madness and predicts every upset correctly.

3-17.event: St. Patrick's Day. LeBron drops 40 in Celtics green. Ironic.

3-18.event: LeBron passes Kevin Garnett on the all-time scoring list.

3-19.event: LeBron begins his wine collection. Future sommelier.

3-20.event: LeBron scores 25+ in his 750th career game. Consistency king.

3-21.event: First day of spring. LeBron blooms with a 35-point performance.

3-22.event: LeBron does a pregame dance. TikTok users everywhere try to copy it.

3-23.event: LeBron records triple-double number 57. Lucky number.

3-24.event: LeBron passes 31,000 career points. Still climbing.

3-25.event: LeBron posts 'Taco Tuesday' throwback. We miss those days.

3-26.event: LeBron notches his 44th career triple-double in a win over Philly.

3-27.event: LeBron works out during COVID lockdown. His IG story is motivational AF.

3-28.event: LeBron scores 30+ against the Bucks. Giannis takes notes.

3-29.event: LeBron misses a game. ESPN does 24/7 coverage on his injury.

3-30.event: LeBron closes out March with a statement 40-piece.

3-31.event: LeBron says 'It's just another game' then drops 35-8-7.

4-1.event: April Fools. LeBron tweets he's retiring. The internet has a meltdown.

4-2.event: LeBron clinches another playoff berth. Streak continues.

4-3.event: LeBron drops 27-8-8 as the playoffs approach. Getting warmed up.

4-4.event: LeBron posts a throwback photo. Nostalgia hits hard.

4-5.event: LeBron scores 30+ in his 400th game as a Cav. Hometown hero.

4-6.event: LeBron notches triple-double number 42. The answer to everything.

4-7.event: LeBron changes his jersey number to 6. New era begins.

4-8.event: LeBron misses the playoffs for the first time since 2005. Still averaging 27-8-8.

4-9.event: LeBron rests before playoffs. ESPN: 'Is LeBron afraid?'

4-10.event: LeBron prepares for his 14th straight playoff run. Unreal consistency.

4-11.event: LeBron likes a tweet about GOAT debates. Subliminal king.

4-12.event: LeBron ends regular season with 25.3 PPG. Another elite year.

4-13.event: LeBron posts workout footage. Still training during pandemic.

4-14.event: LeBron finishes season averaging a near triple-double. Westbrook who?

4-15.event: Playoff LeBron begins hibernation. He'll be back.

4-16.event: LeBron starts playoff run that leads to championship.

4-17.event: LeBron announces he'll play in play-in tournament. Makes it must-see TV.

4-18.event: Playoff LeBron debuts with 35-10-7. Different beast.

4-19.event: LeBron drops 44 in playoff opener. Activated.

4-21.event: LeBron scores 32 in Game 1 vs Bobcats. Playoff mode engaged.

4-22.event: LeBron's birthday week. He gifts US playoff performances every year.

4-23.event: LeBron records playoff triple-double number 17. Playoff mode different.

4-24.event: LeBron wears #24 warmup shirt for Kobe. Forever honoring Mamba.

4-25.event: LeBron drops 27-8-4 in playoff Game 4. Sweep incoming.

4-26.event: LeBron hits game-winner against Pacers. Buzzer beater king.

4-27.event: LeBron dominates Celtics with 31-11-6 in the playoffs.

4-28.event: LeBron practices his wine pairing skills. Renaissance man.

4-29.event: LeBron watches the playoffs from home. Weirdest timeline.

4-30.event: LeBron closes out April with another playoff W. May is coming.

5-1.event: May Day. LeBron sends distress signal with 43-point playoff game.

5-2.event: LeBron scores 39 in Game 1 against Raptors. LeBronto begins.

5-3.event: LeBron drops 30-11-6 in playoff Game 2. Routine excellence.

5-4.event: May the Fourth. LeBron channels Jedi energy. Force is strong.

5-5.event: Cinco de Mayo. LeBron celebrates with a playoff victory.

5-6.event: LeBron posts vacation photos. Living his best life.

5-7.event: LeBron drops 42 points against Raptors. LeBronto intensifies.

5-8.event: LeBron advances to conference semis. As expected.

5-9.event: LeBron posts 'Motivated' on Twitter. League is terrified.

5-10.event: LeBron notches playoff triple-double. May dominance continues.

5-11.event: LeBron does a Peloton ride. Makes it look easy.

5-12.event: LeBron scores 35+ in playoff win. Celtics in shambles.

5-13.event: LeBron leads Cavs to conference finals. Road to ship begins.

5-14.event: LeBron drops 44-5-3 in Game 1 vs Celtics. Daddy's home.

5-15.event: LeBron posts a pic with Dwyane Wade. Bromance forever.

5-16.event: LeBron notches 30-9-7 in conference finals. On a mission.

5-17.event: LeBron announces new business venture. Billionaire Bron incoming.

5-18.event: LeBron drops 29 in pivotal playoff game. Clutch gene activated.

5-19.event: LeBron posts 'Miss the game' on IG. We miss watching him.

5-20.event: LeBron scores 35 in blowout win. Playoff dominance on full display.

5-21.event: LeBron leads Cavs past Hawks. Finals bound.

5-22.event: LeBron drops 42 in Game 4 vs Celtics. Unstoppable.

5-23.event: LeBron clinches Eastern Conference Finals. Back to the Finals.

5-24.event: LeBron posts birthday selfie. Still looking 25.

5-25.event: LeBron drops 46-11-9 to force Game 7 vs Celtics. All-time performance.

5-26.event: LeBron does IG Live with fans. Wholesome King.

5-27.event: LeBron prepares for Finals vs Warriors. History awaits.

5-28.event: LeBron drops 37 in Game 5 of ECF. Conference finals MVP.

5-29.event: LeBron goes 12-0 in Eastern Conference playoffs. Perfect.

5-30.event: LeBron posts vacation content. King is chilling.

5-31.event: LeBron scores the Cavs' final 25 points vs Pistons. 48 Special.

6-1.event: June begins. LeBron drops 51 in Finals Game 1. JR Smith ruins it.

6-2.event: LeBron drops 29-11-14 in Finals Game 1. Not enough vs Warriors.

6-4.event: LeBron drops 44 in Finals Game 1. Kyrie and Love out. Solo mission.

6-6.event: LeBron announces return to basketball. Bubble time.

6-7.event: LeBron drops 41 in Finals Game 3. Cavs first Finals win vs Warriors.

6-8.event: LeBron's 51-point Finals game goes down as all-time. JR still confused.

6-9.event: LeBron drops 45 in Game 6 vs Celtics. Best playoff game ever.

6-10.event: LeBron averages triple-double through 4 Finals games. GOAT mode.

6-11.event: LeBron drops 39-16-11 in Finals Game 4. Ridiculous statline.

6-12.event: LeBron wins second championship. Back-to-back titles.

6-13.event: LeBron scores 41 in Finals Game 5. Down 3-1, refuses to quit.

6-14.event: LeBron's Heat lose Finals. He'll be back.

6-15.event: LeBron posts workout video. Bubble prep is serious.

6-16.event: LeBron wins first championship. Monkey off his back.

6-17.event: LeBron drops 41 in Finals Game 6. Forces Game 7.

6-18.event: LeBron watches NBA Finals from home. Strangest timeline.

6-19.event: LeBron wins championship for Cleveland. The Block. The GOAT moment.

6-20.event: LeBron wins Finals MVP. Back-to-back MVPs.

6-22.event: Cleveland celebrates championship parade. LeBron cries with the city.

6-25.event: LeBron contemplates free agency. League on notice.

6-27.event: LeBron posts summer workout content. Year 17 prep begins.

6-28.event: LeBron becomes free agent. Cavs fans hold their breath.

6-29.event: LeBron scrimmages in the bubble. Looking unstoppable.

6-30.event: LeBron re-signs with Cavs. Run it back.
